QuestParts.Response2: Who are you?
QuestParts.Response1: Demons have invaded our land, I was told they came from this cave.
QuestParts.GiverText: Hello, warrior, why you come to my Cave?
From this cave? No, no Demons come from this Cave. Demons warriors attack my cave.
QuestParts.Response2: I knew that crazy dude was lying to me, do you know anything about a man who calls himself Jesus?
QuestParts.Response1: A very holy man gave me this information, are you calling him a liar?

QuestParts.GiverText: Alone in cave I have no name. Long time ago, when I had tribe, they called me... Ken.
QuestParts.Response2: Alright "Ken", maybe you'd like to explain to me why I found you're cave full of Demons?
QuestParts.Response1: Well, Ken, it's nice to meet you, how'd you end up all alone in this cave?

QuestParts.GiverText: For me? I thought I was forgotten by every one else.
QuestParts.Response2: Nah you right, I'm messing with you, what are you doing here bud? You get lost? Need a Banana?
QuestParts.Response1: Not by me laddie. Time to die!
QuestParts.Response3: They did, I had no idea you'd be here who are you?

QuestParts.GiverText: Holy, man? I do not understand. No man in cave. You first I've seen, here.
QuestParts.Response2: A very good man, someone I think I can trust.
QuestParts.Response1: There was a man I met, called himself Jesus, said he saw the first Demons come from inside this cave.
QuestParts.Response3: Why should I believe you? You can barely speak.

QuestParts.GiverText: Craqzy Dude? Jesus? Yes, Demon Warrior Leader, call himself Jesus. Say he want to kill Fox. I like Fox, he my friend, I send Fox outisde Cave.
QuestParts.Response2: He was leading the Demons? Are you sure? How can you tell he was a leader, he looked like a man to me.
QuestParts.Response1: Oh...

QuestParts.GiverText: Demons attack my Cave, Demons led by Demon Warrior disguised as man. Demons kill all my friends. Except Fox, I send him away, to the outside, to keep safe.
QuestParts.Response2: A Demon Warrior disguised as a man? What did he look like?
QuestParts.Response1: Oh...
QuestParts.Response3: How did you manage to survive?

QuestParts.GiverText: Demons attack my Cave. Try to kill me, Demon Warriors kill all my friends. Ken all alone in Cave now. I hide, Demons look for me. Human kill Demons, Human friend of Ken?
QuestParts.Response2: Yes, Human friend of Ken, this Human likes Apes.
QuestParts.Response1: That remains to be seen. What else can you tell me about the Demons? I was told they came from this cave.
QuestParts.Response3: Human not friend of Ape, Human hates Apes, time to die Ken.

QuestParts.GiverText: Is Human Ape friend?
QuestParts.Response2: No.
QuestParts.Response1: Yes.

QuestParts.GiverText: I, do not like, bananas. Has human come to help Ape? To help me?
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Kill the Orangutan for snubbing your generosity.
QuestParts.Response2: You reject my gift Monkey? Just like the rest of your kind, time do prove who the real superior species is here!
QuestParts.Response1: Yeah, I came to help you. What happened here?

QuestParts.GiverText: Jesus? No, no, no. Jesus not man, not true Jesus. Jesus Demon Warrior, murder my friends, try to murder my Fox friend. I send him away, outside Cave, where safe.
QuestParts.Response2: That explains a lot.
QuestParts.Response1: How did you survive?

QuestParts.GiverText: What good man tell Human?
QuestParts.Response1: He told me that Demons came from this cave.

QuestParts.GiverText: What is wrong, man?
QuestParts.Response2: I killed your Fox friend.
QuestParts.Response1: Uhm, nothing, how did you manage to survive here?
QuestParts.Response3: The Demon Jesus tricked me into killing your Fox Friend.

QuestParts.GiverText: Human, blinded by looks. Ape see heart, see inside. Ape know. You human warrior, you help me, you kill Jesus?
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Kill Jesus for the Wise Orangutan or kill the Wise Orangutan for Jesus..
QuestParts.Response2: Nice try buddy, you think I'll trust an Ape over a human? Time to die laddie.
QuestParts.Response1: Yes, I'll help, I'll kill Jesus.

QuestParts.GiverText: You human warrior. You can kill Demon, you kill Demon Jesus!
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Kill the Demon Jesus for Ken and his forest friends or kill Ken for Jesus,
QuestParts.Response2: I don't know, why should I believe you?
QuestParts.Response1: I'll do it.
QuestParts.Response3: No, I think you're lying, that little Fox Fiend gave me a lot of trouble. Time to die Laddie.

QuestParts.GiverText: You save my home, you good man, I save man home, long time ago, I good Ape. We both Ape, work together, save Ape home and Man home.
QuestParts.Response2: I am no ape.
QuestParts.Response1: I like it... Apes together, strong. I will be your champion, I will kill Jesus and get revenge for our friends.

QuestParts.GiverText: We different, but same.
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Kill the Orangutan for insuiating that there ar similarities between Apes and Humans.
QuestParts.Response2: I'm not a DAMN MONKEY! TIME TO DIE DIRTY APE!
QuestParts.Response1: But different.

QuestParts.GiverText: But still same.
QuestParts.Response2: No, we're not, and I. AM. NOT. A. MONKEY! TIME TO DIE BUCKO!
QuestParts.Response1: Can't argue with that logic, I like you better than Jesus, I'll do it, for you and your friends.

QuestParts.GiverText: He had black hair, like darkness. He had beard., and he wore white robes.
QuestParts.Response2: You wouldn't happen to be talking about that Holy Man by the Church?
QuestParts.Response1: Oh no, you don't mean that crazy dude Jesus do you?

QuestParts.GiverText: Then maybe Human can help Ken, help Ken get revenge for friends. Demons led by Demon disguised as man, named himself Jesus.
QuestParts.Response2: Oh no, not this guy again.
QuestParts.Response1: Jesus? That Crazy Dude from the Church?

QuestParts.GiverText: Human may pet me.
QuestParts.Response2: *Pet Ken* eew, this is disgusting, do ever clean yourself?
QuestParts.Response1: *Pet Ken* so soft, what happened here Ken? How'd you end up here all alone?
QuestParts.Response3: *Grab Ken's Fur* Do you feel that? Huh? Do you bud? That's the feeling of power. True power. Your kind may be stronger than us, but you'll never be smarter than us, and knowledge my friend? Knowledge is power. I'm in charge now, laddie, time to die!

QuestParts.GiverText: You may not pet me.
QuestParts.ObjectiveText: Kill the Orangutan and pet his corpse.
QuestParts.Response2: I'm in charge here bucko, I don't like your attitude, let's see how you like my blade!
QuestParts.Response1: Fine. What happened here?

QuestParts.GiverText: Ken does wash, Human let go now, you mean.
QuestParts.Response2: Ape no tell human what to do! Human mad! APE DIE NOW!
QuestParts.Response1: Whatever. Tell me what happened here.

QuestParts.GiverText: I hide here. I know cave, this my home. But Demons look for me, they find me, kill me, if not for you.
QuestParts.Response2: I think I deserve some sort of reward for this no?
QuestParts.Response1: Well, uh, you're welcome.

QuestParts.GiverText: I have nothing, to give. Only have friends in this cave. Not anymore. All dead now, Demon Warriors kill them.
QuestParts.Response2: No reward? Looks like it's time to meet your friends in hell then Bucko!
QuestParts.Response1: I'm sorry.

QuestParts.GiverText: You, kill my friend?
QuestParts.Response2: Yes, I'm sorry, i was tricked by Jesus.
QuestParts.Response1: Yes, and I liked it.

QuestParts.GiverText: Jesus trick human? Human see now, this no Jesus. This evil Demon Warrior. Human see Ape telling the truth.
QuestParts.Response2: Yes he tricked me, but I would've killed him anyway, Foxes deserve to die!
QuestParts.Response1: Yes, I see know, I'm sorry for your friend.

QuestParts.GiverText: You bad Human! BAD HUMAN! HUMAN DIE NOW!
QuestParts.Response1: Bring it on bucko.
